subtitle: A Practical Guide to Building Intelligent Systems

chapters.chapter_description: This chapter provides an overview of machine learning and its applications. It also covers the different types of machine learning algorithms and their use cases.

subchapters.subchapter_description: This section defines machine learning and its importance in today's world.

sections.section_description: This section covers the basics of supervised learning and its use cases.
This section covers the basics of unsupervised learning and its use cases.

subchapters.subchapter_description: This section covers the different types of machine learning algorithms and their use cases.

sections.section_description: This section covers the basics of regression and its use cases.
This section covers the basics of classification and its use cases.
This section covers the basics of clustering and its use cases.

chapters.chapter_description: This chapter covers the different techniques used to preprocess data before feeding it into a machine learning algorithm.

subchapters.subchapter_description: This section covers the different techniques used to clean data, such as handling missing values and outliers.

sections.section_description: This section covers the different techniques used to handle missing values in a dataset.
This section covers the different techniques used to handle outliers in a dataset.

subchapters.subchapter_description: This section covers the different techniques used to transform data, such as scaling and normalization.

sections.section_description: This section covers the different techniques used to scale data.
This section covers the different techniques used to normalize data.

chapters.chapter_description: This chapter covers the different supervised learning algorithms and their use cases.

subchapters.subchapter_description: This section covers the basics of linear regression and its use cases.

sections.section_description: This section covers the basics of simple linear regression.
This section covers the basics of multiple linear regression.

subchapters.subchapter_description: This section covers the basics of logistic regression and its use cases.

sections.section_description: This section covers the basics of binary logistic regression.
This section covers the basics of multinomial logistic regression.

subchapters.subchapter_description: This section covers the basics of decision trees and their use cases.

sections.section_description: This section covers the basics of classification trees.
This section covers the basics of regression trees.

subchapters.subchapter_description: This section covers the basics of support vector machines and their use cases.

sections.section_description: This section covers the basics of linear SVM.
This section covers the basics of non-linear SVM.

chapters.chapter_description: This chapter covers the different unsupervised learning algorithms and their use cases.

subchapters.subchapter_description: This section covers the basics of K-Means clustering and its use cases.

sections.section_description: This section covers how to perform clustering with Scikit-Learn.
This section covers how to evaluate the performance of clustering algorithms.

subchapters.subchapter_description: This section covers the basics of hierarchical clustering and its use cases.

sections.section_description: This section covers the basics of agglomerative clustering.
This section covers the basics of divisive clustering.

subchapters.subchapter_description: This section covers the basics of principal component analysis and its use cases.

sections.section_description: This section covers how to perform PCA with Scikit-Learn.
This section covers how to interpret the results of PCA.

subchapters.subchapter_description: This section covers the basics of association rule mining and its use cases.

sections.section_description: This section covers the basics of the Apriori algorithm.
This section covers how to evaluate the performance of association rule mining algorithms.

chapters.chapter_description: This chapter covers the basics of deep learning and its applications.

subchapters.subchapter_description: This section covers the basics of artificial neural networks and their use cases.

sections.section_description: This section covers the basics of feedforward neural networks.
This section covers the basics of convolutional neural networks.

subchapters.subchapter_description: This section covers the basics of recurrent neural networks and their use cases.

sections.section_description: This section covers the basics of LSTM networks.
This section covers the basics of GRU networks.

subchapters.subchapter_description: This section covers the basics of autoencoders and their use cases.

sections.section_description: This section covers the basics of denoising autoencoders.
This section covers the basics of variational autoencoders.

subchapters.subchapter_description: This section covers the basics of generative adversarial networks and their use cases.

sections.section_description: This section covers the architecture of GANs.
This section covers how to train GANs.
